item.title: Commenting with Giscus
item.description:
For a while now, this website has been powered by Hugo, a fantastic static site generator that ensures the site content is compiled into static files, making it swift and efficient. As a static website, there is no backend server running scripts, which means fewer points of failure and faster load times.

While I’ve been having fun experimenting with CSS and JavaScript to add some dynamic flair, interactive elements, and sleek transitions to bring a modern touch to the site, at its core, it’s all still a beautifully simple static site.
